description: Made with movement and comfort in mind, our Men’s Hudson Trail Fleece Pant gives you the best of both. Super soft, recycled brushed wool fleece helps keep you warm, while the perfectly roomy fit, with an adjustable waistband, helps keep you moving seamlessly. And with five pockets throughout, you’ve got plenty of room for all your handheld hiking essentials. Brave the elements with abrasion-resistant fabric in key areas so you can get after it season to season.
name: Smartwool Hudson Trail Fleece Pants - Mens
